summary: A collection of command‑line utilities used in the continuous‑integration workflow to manage Flet package artifacts. They handle downloading and extracting the web distribution archive, updating version specifications in TOML files, injecting custom tags into Python wheels, and revising wheel metadata and dependencies before repackaging.
business_intent: Automate repetitive CI steps so that builds, releases, and dependency versions are kept in sync without manual intervention, ensuring reliable and reproducible packaging of the Flet library and its web assets.
